articles.title: Ex-national security officials join growing revolt over Trump's calls for military to quell protests
articles.description: More than 280 former national security officials on Friday criticized President Donald Trump's aggressive approach to peaceful protesters, and expressed concern about the presence of US military assets at demonstrations across the country.
